# Clan

# Clan

Clans are a permanent kind of party with additional features.

A clan has a profil which includes several information like tag, name, description. The following use-case diagrams gives an overview about the topics which has to be handled with this schema:

### Manage clan

Every user is allowed to create a clan with [clan/create](#create). Then he is the clan leader. The clan leader is the only one who is allowed to delete the clan with the request [clan/delete](#delete).

Clan leader and clan co-leaders are able to update the profile [clan/update](#update).

Clan leader and clan co-leaders are allowed to invite different players with [clan/invite](#invite). (There are no limitations of the count of members.) The invitation can be cancelled by [clan/cancelInvite](#cancelinvite). Invited players can accept invitiation by [aclan/cceptInvite](#acceptinvite) and decline by [clan/declineInvite](#declineinvite).

Only the clan-leader is able to kick members by [clan/kickMember](#kickmember). Similarly, any member can leave the clan they are currently in with [clan/leave](#leave).

The clan leader is allowed to appoint members as clan co-leader with [clan/setRole](#setrole). The clan leader has also the possibility to transfer his leadership role to a different member with the same command. (ATTENTION: By executing this command the clan leader loses his permissions!)

### Special use cases

If the clan-leader leaves the clan by clan/leave the oldest co-leader is set as new clan leader. If no co-leader exist the oldest member is set as new clan leader.

If the clan-leader leaves the clan and he is the last member the clan will be removed.
---

- [cancel](#cancel)
- [create](#create)
- [decline](#decline)

## Accept

Accept an invite to a clan.

- Endpoint Type: **Request** -> **Response**
- Source: **User**
- Target: **Server**
- Required Scopes: `tachyon.lobby`

### Request

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanAcceptRequest",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "user",
        "target": "server",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": { "const": "request" },
        "messageId": { "type": "string" },
        "commandId": { "const": "clan/accept" },
        "data": {
            "title": "ClanAcceptRequestData",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "user": { "$ref": "#/definitions/user" },
                "clan": { "$ref": "#/definitions/clan" }
            },
            "required": ["user", "clan"]
        }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "data"]
}

```

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export type UserId = string;
export type ClanId = string;
export type ClanRole = "member" | "coLeader" | "leader";

export interface ClanAcceptRequest {
    type: "request";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/accept";
    data: ClanAcceptRequestData;
}
export interface ClanAcceptRequestData {
    user: User;
    clan: Clan;
}
export interface User {
    userId: UserId;
    username: string;
    displayName: string;
    clanId: string | null;
    clanTag: string | null;
    clanName: string | null;
    countryCode?: string;
    status: "offline" | "menu" | "playing" | "lobby";
    rating?: {
        value: number;
    };
    roles?: ("contributor" | "admin" | "moderator" | "tournament_winner" | "tournament_caster")[];
}
export interface Clan {
    clanId: ClanId;
    tag: string;
    name: string;
    description?: string;
    clanMembers: ClanMember[];
}
export interface ClanMember {
    user: User;
    clanId: ClanId;
    role: ClanRole;
}
```

```ts
export type ClanId = string;
export type UserId = string;
export type ClanRole = "member" | "coLeader" | "leader";

export interface ClanCreateRequest {
    type: "request";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/create";
    data: ClanCreateRequestData;
}
export interface ClanCreateRequestData {
    clan: Clan;
}
export interface Clan {
    clanId: ClanId;
    tag: string;
    name: string;
    description?: string;
    clanMembers: ClanMember[];
}
export interface ClanMember {
    user: User;
    clanId: ClanId;
    role: ClanRole;
}
export interface User {
    userId: UserId;
    username: string;
    displayName: string;
    clanId: string | null;
    clanTag: string | null;
    clanName: string | null;
    countryCode?: string;
    status: "offline" | "menu" | "playing" | "lobby";
    rating?: {
        value: number;
    };
    roles?: ("contributor" | "admin" | "moderator" | "tournament_winner" | "tournament_caster")[];
}
```

- Endpoint Type: **Request** -> **Response**
- Source: **User**
- Target: **Server**
- Required Scopes: `tachyon.lobby`

```ts
    type: "request";

    username: string;
    displayName: string;
    clanId: string | null;
    clanTag: string | null;
    clanName: string | null;
    countryCode?: string;
    status: "offline" | "menu" | "playing" | "lobby";
    rating?: {
        value: number;
    };
    roles?: ("contributor" | "admin" | "moderator" | "tournament_winner" | "tournament_caster")[];
}
export interface Clan {
    clanId: ClanId;
    tag: string;
    name: string;
    description?: string;
    clanMembers: ClanMember[];
}
export interface ClanMember {
    user: User;
    clanId: ClanId;
    role: ClanRole;
}
```
### Response

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanDeclineResponse",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "server",
        "target": "user",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "anyOf": [
        {
            "title": "ClanDeclineOkResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/decline" },
                "status": { "const": "success" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status"]
        },
        {
            "title": "ClanDeclineFailResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/decline" },
                "status": { "const": "failed" },
                "reason": {
                    "enum": [
                        "internal_error",
                        "unauthorized",
                        "invalid_request",
                        "command_unimplemented"
                    ]
                },
                "details": { "type": "string" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status", "reason"]
        }
    ]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
    "messageId": "cupidatat Ut Duis exercitation",
    "commandId": "clan/decline",
    "status": "success"
}
```

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts

    type: "response";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/decline";
    status: "success";
}
```
Possible Failed Reasons: `internal_error`, `unauthorized`, `invalid_request`, `command_unimplemented`

## Delete

Delete your clan.

- Endpoint Type: **Request** -> **Response**
- Source: **User**
- Target: **Server**
- Required Scopes: `tachyon.lobby`

### Request

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanDeleteRequest",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "user",
        "target": "server",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": { "const": "request" },
        "messageId": { "type": "string" },
        "commandId": { "const": "clan/delete" },
        "data": {
            "title": "ClanDeleteRequestData",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "user": { "$ref": "#/definitions/user" },
                "clan": { "$ref": "#/definitions/clan" }
            },
            "required": ["user", "clan"]
        }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "data"]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "request",
    "messageId": "ea eu id",
    "commandId": "clan/delete",
    "data": {
        "user": {
            "userId": "351",
            "username": "in ut eiusmod",
            "displayName": "reprehenderit",
            "clanId": "mollit qui Excepteur Ut",
            "clanTag": null,
            "clanName": null,
            "countryCode": "eu velit cupidatat incididunt ad",
            "status": "offline",
            "rating": {
                "value": 40427064.89562988
            },
            "roles": [
                "tournament_caster",
                "contributor",
                "tournament_winner",
                "moderator"
            ]
        },
        "clan": {
            "clanId": "12345",
            "tag": "Duis",
            "name": "in ut culpa Ut enim",
            "description": "fugiat",
            "clanMembers": []
        }
    }
}
```
</details>

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export type UserId = string;
export type ClanId = string;
export type ClanRole = "member" | "coLeader" | "leader";

export interface ClanDeleteRequest {
    type: "request";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/delete";
    data: ClanDeleteRequestData;
}
export interface ClanDeleteRequestData {
    user: User;
    clan: Clan;
}
export interface User {
    userId: UserId;
    username: string;
    displayName: string;
    clanId: string | null;
    clanTag: string | null;
    clanName: string | null;
    countryCode?: string;
    status: "offline" | "menu" | "playing" | "lobby";
    rating?: {
        value: number;
    };
    roles?: ("contributor" | "admin" | "moderator" | "tournament_winner" | "tournament_caster")[];
}
export interface Clan {
    clanId: ClanId;
    tag: string;
    name: string;
    description?: string;
    clanMembers: ClanMember[];
}
export interface ClanMember {
    user: User;
    clanId: ClanId;
    role: ClanRole;
}
```
### Response

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanDeleteResponse",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "server",
        "target": "user",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "anyOf": [
        {
            "title": "ClanDeleteOkResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/delete" },
                "status": { "const": "success" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status"]
        },
        {
            "title": "ClanDeleteFailResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/delete" },
                "status": { "const": "failed" },
                "reason": {
                    "enum": [
                        "internal_error",
                        "unauthorized",
                        "invalid_request",
                        "command_unimplemented"
                    ]
                },
                "details": { "type": "string" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status", "reason"]
        }
    ]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "response",
    "messageId": "Excepteur aute Duis",
    "commandId": "clan/delete",
    "status": "success"
}
```

```ts

    type: "response";

    commandId: "clan/delete";
    status: "success";
}
```

Possible Failed Reasons: `internal_error`, `unauthorized`, `invalid_request`, `command_unimplemented`

```json
        "type": { "const": "event" },

        "data": {
            "title": "ClanDeletedEventData",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": { "clan": { "$ref": "#/definitions/clan" } },
            "required": ["clan"]
        }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "data"]
}

```
</details>

```json
    "type": "event",

            "clanId": "12345",
            "tag": "est a",
            "name": "consectetur ",

            "clanMembers": []
        }
    }
}
```

```ts
    data: ClanDeletedEventData;
}

    clan: Clan;
}

    clanId: ClanId;
    tag: string;
    name: string;
    description?: string;
    clanMembers: ClanMember[];
}

    user: User;
    clanId: ClanId;
    role: ClanRole;

    userId: UserId;

    displayName: string;

        value: number;
```

```json
                        "command_unimplemented"
                    ]
                },
                "details": { "type": "string" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status", "reason"]
        }
    ]
}

```
</details>

```json
    "type": "response",
    "messageId": "veniam laboris minim",
    "commandId": "clan/kick",
    "status": "success"
}
```

```ts
    type: "response";

    status: "success";
}
```
Possible Failed Reasons: `internal_error`, `unauthorized`, `invalid_request`, `command_unimplemented`

## Kicked

A player was kicked from a clan. Sent to the kicked player.

- Endpoint Type: **Event**
- Source: **Server**
- Target: **User**
- Required Scopes: `tachyon.lobby`

### Event

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanKickedEvent",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "server",
        "target": "user",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": { "const": "event" },
        "messageId": { "type": "string" },
        "commandId": { "const": "clan/kicked" },
        "data": {
            "title": "ClanKickedEventData",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": { "clan": { "$ref": "#/definitions/clan" } },
            "required": ["clan"]
        }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "data"]
}

```
</details>

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export type ClanId = string;
export type UserId = string;
export type ClanRole = "member" | "coLeader" | "leader";

export interface ClanKickedEvent {
    type: "event";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/kicked";
    data: ClanKickedEventData;
}
export interface ClanKickedEventData {
    clan: Clan;
}
export interface Clan {
    clanId: ClanId;
    tag: string;
    name: string;
    description?: string;
    clanMembers: ClanMember[];
}
export interface ClanMember {
    user: User;
    clanId: ClanId;
    role: ClanRole;
}
export interface User {
    userId: UserId;
    username: string;
    displayName: string;
    clanId: string | null;
    clanTag: string | null;
    clanName: string | null;
    countryCode?: string;
    status: "offline" | "menu" | "playing" | "lobby";
    rating?: {
        value: number;
    };
    roles?: ("contributor" | "admin" | "moderator" | "tournament_winner" | "tournament_caster")[];
}
```

```json
                "status": { "const": "failed" },
                "reason": {
                    "enum": [
                        "internal_error",
                        "unauthorized",
                        "invalid_request",
                        "command_unimplemented"
                    ]
                },
                "details": { "type": "string" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status", "reason"]
        }
    ]
}
```

```ts
    type: "response";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/view";
    status: "success";
    data: ClanViewOkResponseData;
}
export interface ClanViewOkResponseData {
    clanId: ClanId;
    tag: string;
    name: string;
    description?: string;
    clanMembers: ClanMember[];
}
export interface ClanMember {
    user: User;
    clanId: ClanId;
    role: ClanRole;
}
export interface User {
    userId: UserId;
    username: string;
    displayName: string;
    clanId: string | null;
    clanTag: string | null;
    clanName: string | null;
    countryCode?: string;
    status: "offline" | "menu" | "playing" | "lobby";
    rating?: {
        value: number;
    };
    roles?: ("contributor" | "admin" | "moderator" | "tournament_winner" | "tournament_caster")[];
}
```
Possible Failed Reasons: `internal_error`, `unauthorized`, `invalid_request`, `command_unimplemented`

---

## ViewList

Get the list of clans

- Endpoint Type: **Request** -> **Response**
- Source: **User**
- Target: **Server**
- Required Scopes: `tachyon.lobby`

### Request

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanViewListRequest",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "user",
        "target": "server",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": { "const": "request" },
        "messageId": { "type": "string" },
        "commandId": { "const": "clan/viewList" }
    },
    "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId"]
}

```
</details>

<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "request",
    "messageId": "voluptate minim aute",
    "commandId": "clan/viewList"
}
```
</details>

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export interface ClanViewListRequest {
    type: "request";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/viewList";
}
```
### Response

<details>
<summary>JSONSchema</summary>

```json
{
    "title": "ClanViewListResponse",
    "tachyon": {
        "source": "server",
        "target": "user",
        "scopes": ["tachyon.lobby"]
    },
    "anyOf": [
        {
            "title": "ClanViewListOkResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/viewList" },
                "status": { "const": "success" },
                "data": {
                    "title": "ClanViewListOkResponseData",
                    "type": "object",
                    "properties": {
                        "clans": {
                            "type": "array",
                            "items": { "$ref": "#/definitions/clan" }
                        }
                    },
                    "required": ["clans"]
                }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status", "data"]
        },
        {
            "title": "ClanViewListFailResponse",
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "type": { "const": "response" },
                "messageId": { "type": "string" },
                "commandId": { "const": "clan/viewList" },
                "status": { "const": "failed" },
                "reason": {
                    "enum": [
                        "internal_error",
                        "unauthorized",
                        "invalid_request",
                        "command_unimplemented"
                    ]
                },
                "details": { "type": "string" }
            },
            "required": ["type", "messageId", "commandId", "status", "reason"]
        }
    ]
}

```
</details>

#### TypeScript Definition
```ts
export type ClanId = string;
export type UserId = string;
export type ClanRole = "member" | "coLeader" | "leader";

export interface ClanViewListOkResponse {
    type: "response";
    messageId: string;
    commandId: "clan/viewList";
    status: "success";
    data: ClanViewListOkResponseData;
}
export interface ClanViewListOkResponseData {
    clans: Clan[];
}
export interface Clan {
    clanId: ClanId;
    tag: string;
    name: string;
    description?: string;
    clanMembers: ClanMember[];
}
export interface ClanMember {
    user: User;
    clanId: ClanId;
    role: ClanRole;
}
export interface User {
    userId: UserId;
    username: string;
    displayName: string;
    clanId: string | null;
    clanTag: string | null;
    clanName: string | null;
    countryCode?: string;
    status: "offline" | "menu" | "playing" | "lobby";
    rating?: {
        value: number;
    };
    roles?: ("contributor" | "admin" | "moderator" | "tournament_winner" | "tournament_caster")[];
}
```
Possible Failed Reasons: `internal_error`, `unauthorized`, `invalid_request`, `command_unimplemented`
